A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the most interesting movie to come out of the Star Wars Saga. This can be a real home run for this film\, but also can be at its determent. Kylo is by far the best part of this new trilogy\, but seeing Luke again was quite amazing. The film often has subplots that are not nearly as interesting or entertaining as the Rey/Kylo/Luke stories. Overall a good movie\, but not a great Star Wars film.
